languages.text:
Сбор десятины — неотъемлемая часть экономики Империума. Условия поставок определяются Администратумом и варьируются от планеты к планете: ее могут собирать как ежедневно, так и раз в 50 лет. Что конкретно изымается — еда, промышленные товары или даже люди — обуславливается рангом десятины.
Черные корабли приходят за своей данью независимо от сбора имперской десятины, и мирам необходимо уплачивать оба налога, дабы не навлечь на себя гнев высших властей.

traits.locale_text:
Условия поставок варьируются от планеты к планете: ее могут собирать как ежедневно, так и раз в 50 лет. Что конкретно изымается — еда, промышленные товары или даже люди — зависит от ранга десятины. Для каждой планеты определяются свои условия и способ организации поставок.
Черные корабли приходят за своей данью независимо от сбора имперской десятины. Необходимо уплачивать оба налога, дабы не навлечь на себя гнев высших властей.

languages.text:
Tithe collection is a core element of the Imperium's economy. Terms of delivery are set by the Administratum and vary from world to world: it may be shipped daily, or once every 50 years. The specific resources collected, such as food, industrial products, or even people, are determined by the tithe grade.
The Black Ships come to collect their due independently of the Imperial Tithe, so worlds must pay both levies if they wish to avoid incurring the wrath of the highest authorities.

Черные корабли приходят за своей данью независимо от сбора имперской десятины, и мирам необходимо уплачивать оба налога, дабы не навлечь на себя гнев высших властей.

traits.locale_text:
Tithe collection is a core element of the Imperium's economy. Terms of delivery are set by the Administratum and vary from world to world: it may be shipped daily or once every 50 years. The specific resources collected — such as food, industrial products, or even people, are determined by the tithe grade.
The Black Ships come to collect their due independently of the Imperial Tithe, so worlds must pay both taxes if they wish to avoid incurring the wrath of the highest authorities.

Tithe intervals vary between planets: it may be shipped daily or once every 50 years. The specific resources collected — such as food, industrial products, or even people — depend on the world's Tithe Grade. The terms and organisational methods of tithe shipment are set individually for each planet. The Black Ships come to collect their due independently of the Imperial Tithe, so worlds must pay both taxes if they are to avoid incurring the wrath of the highest authorities.

The Black Ships come to collect their due independently of the Imperial Tithe, so worlds must pay both tariffs if they wish to avoid incurring the wrath of the highest authorities.

languages.text: Die Erhebung des Zehnts ist ein Kernelement der imperialen Wirtschaft. Die Lieferbedingungen werden vom Administratum bestimmt und variieren von Welt zu Welt. Die Verschiffung kann täglich oder alle 50 Jahre erfolgen. Die erhobenen Ressourcen wie Lebensmittel, Industrieprodukte oder Menschen werden durch den Zehntgrad definiert.Da die Schwarzen Schiffe ihre Gebühren unabhängig vom imperialen Zehnt eintreiben, müssen Welten beide Abgaben entrichten, um nicht den Zorn der höchsten Behören zu erregen.
languages.original_text:
Tithe collection is a core element of the Imperium's economy. Terms of delivery are set by the Administratum and vary from world to world: it may be shipped daily, or once every 50 years. The specific resources collected, such as food, industrial products, or even people, are determined by the tithe grade.
The Black Ships come to collect their due independently of the Imperial Tithe, so worlds must pay both levies if they wish to avoid incurring the wrath of the highest authorities.

traits.locale_text: Die Erhebung des Zehnts ist ein Kernelement der imperialen Wirtschaft. Die Lieferbedingungen werden vom Administratum bestimmt und variieren von Welt zu Welt. Die Verschiffung kann täglich oder alle 50 Jahre erfolgen. Die erhobenen Ressourcen wie Lebensmittel, Industrieprodukte oder Menschen werden durch den Zehntgrad definiert.Da die Schwarzen Schiffe ihre Gebühren unabhängig vom imperialen Zehnt eintreiben, müssen Welten beide Abgaben entrichten, um nicht den Zorn der höchsten Behören zu erregen.

languages.text:
La collecte de la dîme est un élément central de l'économie de l'Imperium. Les conditions de versement sont déterminées par l'Administratum et diffèrent d'un monde à l'autre : certains paient quotidiennement, d'autres une fois tous les 50 ans. Les ressources perçues dépendent du niveau de dîme et sont de natures variées, des denrées alimentaires aux produits industriels en passant par des individus.
Comme les Vaisseaux Noirs viennent chercher leur dû indépendamment de la dîme impériale, les mondes doivent payer ces deux taxes sous peine d'encourir le courroux des autorités supérieures.
languages.original_text:
Tithe collection is a core element of the Imperium's economy. Terms of delivery are set by the Administratum and vary from world to world: it may be shipped daily, or once every 50 years. languages.text:
什一税是帝国经济的核心要素，征收条例由帝国内政部制定。不同世界的具体条例也各不相同，可能每天征收一次，也可能每隔五十年才征收一次。帝国会征收各种各样的什一税资源，包括食品、工业产品，乃至活生生的人。
黑船征收的什一税资源，与其他类别的什一税资源相互独立。所有行星都必须按时缴纳什一税，否则就会招致最高当局的怒火。
languages.original_text:
Tithe collection is a core element of the Imperium's economy. Terms of delivery are set by the Administratum and vary from world to world: it may be shipped daily, or once every 50 years. The specific resources collected, such as food, industrial products, or even people, are determined by the tithe grade.
The Black Ships come to collect their due independently of the Imperial Tithe, so worlds must pay both levies if they wish to avoid incurring the wrath of the highest authorities.

languages.text:
La recolección del diezmo es un elemento clave en la economía del Imperium. Los plazos de entrega los dicta el Administratum y dependen del planeta. Puede ser un envío diario o puede ser cada 50 años. Los recursos específicos, (ya sean comida, productos industriales o incluso personas) dependen del grado de diezmo del mundo.
La Naves Negras recogen su tributo de forma independiente del Diezmo Imperial, por lo que los mundos deben pagar ambos impuestos si desean evitar la furia de las mayores autoridades.
languages.original_text:
Tithe collection is a core element of the Imperium's economy. Terms of delivery are set by the Administratum and vary from world to world: it may be shipped daily, or once every 50 years. The specific resources collected, such as food, industrial products, or even people, are determined by the tithe grade.
The Black Ships come to collect their due independently of the Imperial Tithe, so worlds must pay both levies if they wish to avoid incurring the wrath of the highest authorities.

traits.locale_text:
La recolección del diezmo es un elemento clave en la economía del Imperium. Los plazos de entrega los dicta el Administratum y dependen del planeta. Puede ser un envío diario o puede ser cada 50 años. Los recursos específicos, (ya sean comida, productos industriales o incluso personas) dependen del grado de diezmo del mundo.
La Naves Negras recogen su tributo de forma independiente del Diezmo Imperial, por lo que los mundos deben pagar ambos impuestos si desean evitar la furia de las mayores autoridades.

languages.text: 租税の納入間隔は惑星ごとに異なり、毎日送られる場合もあれば、50年に一度ということもある。集められる具体的な資源は、食料や工業製品、さらには人間まで、惑星の租税等級によって決まる。租税の輸送に関する条件や組織的な方法は、それぞれの惑星ごとに個別に定められている。〈黒き船〉は帝国租税とは別に徴収に訪れるため、惑星は最高権威の怒りを避けるために、両方の税を支払わなければならない。
languages.original_text: Tithe intervals vary between planets: it may be shipped daily or once every 50 years. The specific resources collected — such as food, industrial products, or even people — depend on the world's tithe grade. The terms and organisational methods of tithe shipment are set individually for each planet. The Black Ships come to collect their due independently of the Imperial Tithe, so worlds must pay both taxes if they wish to avoid incurring the wrath of the highest authorities.

traits.locale_text: 租税の納入間隔は惑星ごとに異なり、毎日送られる場合もあれば、50年に一度ということもある。集められる具体的な資源は、食料や工業製品、さらには人間まで、惑星の租税等級によって決まる。租税の輸送に関する条件や組織的な方法は、それぞれの惑星ごとに個別に定められている。〈黒き船〉は帝国租税とは別に徴収に訪れるため、惑星は最高権威の怒りを避けるために、両方の税を支払わなければならない。

languages.text:
Aşar toplama, İmparatorluk ekonomisinin temel unsunlarından biridir. Teslimat koşulları, Administratum tarafından belirlenir ve dünyadan dünyaya farklılık gösterir. Günlük toplananları da 50 yılda bir tahsil edilenleri de bulunur. Aşar derecesine göre gıda, sınai ürünler ve hatta insanlar gibi belirli birtakım kaynaklar toplanır.
Kara Gemiler, alacağını İmparatorluk Aşarı'ndan bağımsız olarak toplamaya gelirler. Bu sebeple dünyalar, en tepedeki yetkililerin gazabına uğramak istemiyorlarsa her iki vergiyi de ödemek zorundadır.
languages.original_text:

The specific resources collected, such as food, industrial products, or even people, are determined by the tithe grade.
The Black Ships come to collect their due independently of the Imperial Tithe, so worlds must pay both levies if they wish to avoid incurring the wrath of the highest authorities.
